Dai Mubai and Zhu Zhuqing earn family recognition, becoming the Star Luo Crown Prince and the future Crown Princess, respectively.

programme.title: James' Going Places V - EP 14

programme.title: The In-Laws - EP 18
programme.desc: Lin Bao Zhu (Li Si Qi) lost her husband at a young age, forcing her to shoulder the responsibility of running a food stall left behind by her husband, and raising her two sons Jian Ye (Darren Lim) and Jian Hai (Pierre Png). Under the strict control of her mother-in-law Xiang Qin (Jin Yin Ji), not only did Bao Zhu raise her family well, but she also expanded and grew her business into a successful home delivery food service company.

programme.desc: With the theme of Heaven's Fugitive, Bang Jack has to deal with debt collectors who have minimal religious knowledge to teach them to become sharia-compliant debt collectors.

programme.title: INEM PEMBANTU GOKIL KONTROVERSI HATI
programme.desc: Inem (Michelle Ziudith) has just returned from her village to Jakarta for work. While chasing a thief, she accidentally breaks Bobi's (Fendy Chow) tripod, which upsets him. It turns out Inem is working at his house, further infuriating him.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 28
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Mendang Mending Tar Bilek Lagi
programme.desc: Mendang Mending Tar Bilek Lagi tells the story of a couple named Sam (Hardi Fadillah) and Alea (Andi Viola) who dated in high school but eventually broke up. Recently, they have become close again because they both feel they are not compatible with their current partners.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 482
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.desc: A handsome widower named Doni who has two children, a girl and a boy. Doni, who is alone after his wife passed away, actually needs a life partner, but Doni is reluctant to date. programme.title: Sejauh Ini Yang Paling Jauh Adalah Nyariin Kamu
programme.desc: Luna was arranged by her mother to marry a rich and possessive man named Baim. Luna, who flatly rejected the matchmaking, showed her dislike for Baim in front of her mother. One day, Luna ran away from home and accidentally got into Akbar's car.

programme.title: Hidup Lagi Cabe-Cabenya Malah Dikasih Sambalado
programme.desc: Dian becomes a teaching assistant at a university. However, Dian has to deal with a handsome student named Abi. That morning, Dian and Abi were riding a motorbike and chasing each other to get to campus. However, it turned out that both of them were late and had to be suspended for a semester. From there, Dian then worked part-time at a restaurant owned by Abi's family. However, Dian said, "You are a Madesu, the Future is Bleak.

programme.desc: Setiap minggu Sherry dan ketua kumpulan akan di bawa ke kampung yang berlainan bersama artis jemputan untuk menolong ketua kumpulan memenangi perlawanan mingguan

programme.title: 3 dara kg.com - EP 20
programme.desc: Esah, Awa dan Noi, tiga dara pingitan yang berkawan baik meski berbeza personaliti. Mereka berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja dan secara tak sengaja bertemu Kak Lala, seorang tauke jamu terkenal

programme.title: Joras & Stars - EP 2
programme.desc: Joras & Stars ialah sketsa yang menampilkan Naib Juara MLM 2016 bersama artis jemputan setiap minggu untuk menghiburkan penonton melalui sketsa yang kelakar.

programme.title: Pulau Ke Pulau - EP 10
programme.desc: Rancangan ini membawa anda menjelajah dari satu pulau ke satu pulau yang menarik di Malaysia ini sambil mempelajari sesuatu yang baru tentang keunikan pulau-pulau ini.

programme.title: Carca Marba - EP 10
programme.desc: Ikuti aneka sketsa lucu berkisar tentang isu dan rutin seharian kehidupan masyarakat setempat.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong? S5 - EP 11
programme.desc: Betul Ke Bohong musim kelima membawa selebriti berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak.

programme.title: Lawak Ke Dik? - EP 11
programme.desc: Program untuk kanak-kanak bagi menyuarakan pendapat dan berkongsi buah fikiran mereka secara spontan.

programme.title: Pura-Pura Kaya - EP 9
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Marsha dari kota Bandung mencuba nasib di Jakarta. Cita-citanya untuk mencuba nasib di Jakarta adalah melebihi kejayaan rakan-rakannya.

programme.title: Jep & Judin - EP 5
programme.desc: Jep dan Judin adik-beradik tiri yang lurus bendul meminati sukan bermotor. Jep mahu jadi Johan Rempit dan Judin mahu menolongnya mencapai mimpi itu.

programme.title: 123 Glamour - EP 8
programme.desc: Saksikan peserta mempersembahkan bakat mereka kepada barisan juri dan siapakh di antara mereka yang berjaya menarik hati para juri untuk bergelar juara?

programme.title: Onyomat Geset Go - EP 6
programme.desc: 12 pelawak menjelajah Malaysia dan hanya seorang juara yang bakal memenangi hadiah lumayan.

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat - EP 8
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom game show yang paling tidak adil di dunia dan memang tidak akan adil seperti realiti kehidupan di pejabat andamungkin?

programme.title: Pecah Perut - EP 10
programme.desc: Sebuah program sketsa komedi yang menampilkan barisan pelawak dan pelakon popular seperti Kamal Adli, Sherry Al-Hadad, Shahrul Shiro, Mamak Puteh dan ramai lagi.

programme.title: Meja Panggang - EP 10
programme.desc: Saksikan mereka 'memanggang' para tetamu dengan soalan-soalan panas tentang kisah lampau dan peribadi mereka.

programme.title: Tak Kot - EP 10
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular tanah air bercuti sambil dicabar menangani fobia yang terdapat dalam diri mereka. Berjayakah mereka menyelesaikan misi?

programme.title: Ini Malam Kita Punya - EP 7

programme.title: Pok Ya Cong Codei Memburu Siti - EP 10

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 46
programme.desc: Adellia terkejut apabila mengetahui ada berita yang memburukkan namanya sudah tersebar di media sosial. Mak Pah mahu Maria lebih berhati-hati. Zayn mula resah akibat ditimpa masalah kewangan.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 3

programme.title: Chori Chori Chupke Chupke
programme.desc: Raj and Priya, a married couple, hire Madhubala, a prostitute, as the surrogate mother of their child. Trouble brews when Madhubala falls in love with Raj and insists on keeping the child. Release Year: 2001 Director: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla Awards: Bollywood Movie Award - Most Sensational Actor - Salman Khan

programme.title: Paying Guests
programme.desc: The story revolves around four friends Bhavesh, Parag, Parikshat, and Jayesh who are asked to vacate their rented apartment. As the friends are broke and have nowhere to go, so the hapless foursome decides to pose as couples to rent the apartment. Release Year: 2009 Director: Paritosh Painter

programme.title: Fitoor
programme.desc: Noor, a Kashmiri boy from a poor family, is hired as a stable keeper by a begum. Release Year: 2016 Director: Abhishek Kapoor Awards: 2016 Winner Special Mention- Tabu- ActreSS

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: An orphan joins RAW, the foreign intelligence agency of India. During a mission, all of his comrades die and he decides to seek revenge to find peace in his life. Release Year: 2018 Director: Anil Sharma Awards: 2019 Winner Popular Award- Best Male Debut- Utkarsh Sharma

programme.title: Naam Shabana
programme.desc: After serving time for killing her abusive father, Shabana is recruited by an Indian spy agency for a highly classified mission. Release Year: 2017 Director: Shivam Nair Awards: 2018 Winner Special Award- Extraordinary Impact ActreSS- Taapsee Pannu

Release Year: 2017 Director: Mohit Suri Awards: 2018 Winner Viewers' Choice Award- Best Song of the Year, 2018 Winner Listeners' Choice Award- Best Song, 2018 Winner Critics' Award- Best Singer - Female- Shreya Ghoshal

programme.desc: An ex-cop is hired by a pimp to find missing call girls and the man responsible behind their abduction. programme.title: Gadar 2
programme.desc: When Tara Singh goes missing during a skirmish and is believed to be captured in Pakistan, his son Jeete sets out to rescue him and enters a labyrinth from which they both must escape at all costs. Release Year: 2023 Director: Anil Sharma

programme.desc: Rhea, a free-spirited girl, loses her freedom after her father becomes the prime minister of India. She meets Aryan on a vacation in South Africa and elopes with him. 2016 Release Year: 2016 Director: Sameer Sippy

programme.title: Selon La Police
programme.desc: One morning, Ping-Pong, a cop used to working the streets, burns his police ID card and disappears without trace in Toulouse. For a day and a night, his colleagues search for him in the city and his home neighbourhood. But each hour that passes brings Ping-Pong closer to his destiny...

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 1
programme.desc: Margot's Alzheimer's disease is progressing and Louis now lives with his mother. eleonore is forced to rest. Alice has been suffering from depression since she learnt that Laurent was having an affair with her ex, Manon.

programme.title: File D'attente
programme.desc: Alice makes her grand return to work but a colleague decides to make her life difficult. Laurie-Lou visits the library with her mother, Nathalie. But things don't go quite as planned.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 3
programme.desc: Margot has gone missing: Louis and Sophie have no choice but to call the police. Dominique finds she has plenty in common with Tony. eleonore moves into her grandfather's garage.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 4
programme.desc: Since giving birth, eleonore feels she's going round in circles and is having difficulty finding something new to motivate her. Laurie-Lou, accompanied by Louis and Margot, visit her mother in hospital.

programme.desc: What's new in the Arab worlds? Journalist Mohamed Kaci hosts those making the cultural headlines in Tunis, Algiers, Rabat, Beirut, Alexandria, Dubai...

programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 4
programme.desc: Between Italy, Savoie and the Hautes-Alpes, the Claree Valley is considered one of the most beautiful Alpine valleys. Unspoilt, with no major tourist infrastructure, it offers sublime landscapes between larch forests and rocky cliffs. It is particularly well-known to fans of the crime series ''Alex Hugo''.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 11
programme.desc: In the canton of Basel, we visit the home of Daniel, a fan of antiques who has built and decorated his house thanks to his passion for ancient objects. Then we discover the house of Paul, who has turned an electric transformer station into a home.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 2
programme.desc: Quebec's culinary heritage wouldn't be the same without ground meat. To honor this often-misunderstood ingredient, we invite Nathalie Simard, Jean-Sebastien Girard, and chefs Marc Maula and Amine Laabi.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 9
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 12
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 25
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 42
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 23
programme.desc: Kongoue Bian seems to have become possessed by a spirit and hurls himself at Ebri Morrow intent on grabbing his purse. Pokou passes her final test. The High Priestess recounts the story of Anansi.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 24
programme.desc: Pokou returns to Kumassi in a bubble with N'zi and Lucio. Ebri Morrow uses a spider's web to immobilise Kongoue Bian without getting close to him: he ties him up with the strands of the web and gradually draws him closer.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 15
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 9
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: A Ciel Ouvert
programme.desc: Alysson views her body with distrust. Evanne seeks escape until the fall. Amina can't get her words out of her mouth... Le Courtil lies on the border between France and Belgium, an unusual place that cares for these children with psychological and social difficulties.

programme.title: Trajet De Nuit
programme.desc: Paris, 3 a.m. A young rideshare driver picks up his passenger. The conversation begins, the routine breaks, but the ride will turn into a confrontation.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 7
programme.desc: Paule is falling increasingly in love with Julien, a situation firmly disapproved of by the law firm. Consumed by guilt, Irene is determined to watch over her, to the point of following her into the most extreme situations. Together they even go as far as exhuming a victim's body...

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 8
programme.desc: Paule and Irene take a major pharmaceutical company to court for having marketed a drug dangerous for young children. By working together they manage to win the confidence of a cardiologist, a whistle-blower sidelined by her superior because of her accusations.

programme.title: Meurtres A Chartres
programme.desc: While a wedding is taking place in Chartres Cathedral, one of the witnesses is found dead in the crypt. The investigation is entrusted to Captains Victoire and Pierre Templard. The husband and wife police team soon realise that the murder is linked to the legend of the mysterious pregnant Virgin.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: 64' Actu

programme.title: Movie - Giri
programme.desc: Two feuding landlords struggle to destroy each other. When one of them loses his son, he vows to kill the son of his rival. The boy, however, manages to escape only to return 20 years later.

programme.title: Movie - Orampo
programme.desc: Chandru races his autorickshaw for sport while his friend Bigilu acts as his mechanic. However, tragedy strikes when he begins to date Bigilu's niece while simultaneously challenging a rival racer.

programme.title: Movie - Putham Pudhu Payanam
programme.desc: Three people who have blood cancer meet another rich guy with the same condition at a hospital. They all have only a few months to live. Over time, they become friends, leave hospital, and go to a village which is being terrorized.

programme.title: Movie - Kaadhal Pisase
programme.desc: Vasantha, the son of a maid, pursue higher education as he aspires to have a successful career. However, his life takes a drastic turn when several circumstances force him to become a criminal.

programme.title: Movie - Shankar Guru
programme.desc: Shankar Guru, an honest man, fights for the rights of poor people. When Seeta falls in love with him, a few gangsters try to attack her to teach Shankar a lesson.

programme.desc: Raghu returns to his village and learns that people are being terrorised by a notorious gang. His world comes crashing down when he realises that his sister is in love with the leader of the gang.

programme.desc: Yama attempts to save an innocent child and accidentally rescues a corrupt politician along with her. Lord Shiva, who is furious about Yama's mistake, gives him an ultimatum to amend the situation.

programme.desc: Raja and Kaveri are childhood friends who fall in love with each other. Kaveri's mother wants her to get married to her uncle, but the temple elephant helps the lovers unite.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker Championship 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. programme.desc: The 2025 ICC Women's Cricket World Cup will be the 13th edition of Women's Cricket World Cup. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 7
programme.desc: Arriving in England on a scholarship at the age of 15, Harry Kewell went on to become one of the greatest Australian footballers to have played the game. He looks back at some of his most memorable Premier League moments at Leeds United and Liverpool.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 26
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. A celebrated footballer who lit up the English top-flight during his illustrious career; a winner of multiple domestic and European honours, he became a true legend of the Premier League era. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier League's greatest ever players.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 17
programme.desc: With Djibril Cisse. A former Premier League star sits down to select the best team they played with, guiding us through their picks from 1-to-11 and including insights and anecdotes from on and off the pitch.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 11
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: Ahead of the first North London derby of the season, we sit down with the man who made one of most controversial transfers in World football; Sol Campbell. He opens up about his decision to leave Tottenham for their fiercest rivals, Arsenal, the intense pressure of returning to White Hart Lane that first season, and how he's dealt with the fallout ever since. A fascinating insight into the 'move that shook North London'.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 49
programme.desc: From humble beginnings, Djibril Cisse set French football alight under the tutelage of legendary coach Guy Roux, before finding himself filling the boots of Michael Owen at Liverpool. Horrific injuries, miraculous comebacks and trophies would follow in the dramatic career of one of football's most enigmatic characters.

programme.title: PL BEST OF... PREMIER LEAGUE FRENCH CONNECTION
programme.desc: A celebration of France's greatest football icons, featuring Thierry Henry, David Ginola, Robert Pires, Claude Makelele, Emmanuel Petit and many more.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 12
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Giroud's career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of football's most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Liverpool (MW13) - EP 129
programme.desc: West Ham have won just one of their last 18 Premier League games against Liverpool (D3 L14), beating them 3-2 at the London Stadium in November 2021.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW13) - EP 127
programme.desc: Aston Villa have lost just one of their last 24 Premier League home games (W15 D8), going down 3-0 against Crystal Palace in August.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW13) - EP 128
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have won two of their three Premier League home games against Brighton (L1), winning 7-0 in this exact fixture last term.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Tottenham Hotspur (MW14) (Live) - EP 133
programme.desc: Newcastle have won five of their last six Premier League games against Tottenham (L1), as many as they had in their previous 17 (D2 L10).

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Tottenham Hotspur (MW14) - EP 133
programme.desc: Newcastle have won five of their last six Premier League games against Tottenham (L1), as many as they had in their previous 17 (D2 L10).

programme.title: Fulham vs Manchester City (MW14) - EP 132
programme.desc: Fulham have lost their last 18 meetings with Manchester City in all competitions, the longest losing run one side has had against another in English football history.

programme.title: Bournemouth vs Everton (MW14) - EP 131
programme.desc: Everton have never won in eight away league games against Bournemouth (D2 L6), losing the last four in a row. Its the most theyve faced a side on the road without ever winning in their league history.

programme.title: 1-to-11 2025/26 - EP 5
programme.desc: Known simply as The Yak, Yakubu takes on 1-to-11, selecting his ultimate lineup from the best players he shared the pitch with. A powerhouse striker with 95 Premier League goals across spells at Portsmouth, Middlesbrough, Everton, and Blackburn, he reflects on the teammates who made the biggest impression during his career. Expect a team full of strength, flair, and goalscoring pedigree.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 26
programme.desc: We sit down for an exclusive interview with the first of two new Premier League Hall of fame inductees, Eden Hazard. He reflects on his rise to the top, the moments that defined his career, and the immense pride he feels at joining the elite ranks of the Premier Leagues greatest ever players.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 16
programme.desc: Few players have had a journey to the Premier League like Brentford's Igor Thiago. Ten years ago, he was working as a bricklayer on the outskirts of Brasilia to support his family. Fast forward a decade, with stops at Ludogorets and Club Brugge in between, he is second only to Erling Haaland in Premier League goals this season, after a debut campaign disrupted by injury.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Rafal Haratyk
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by an incredible middleweight fight that ends with a tapout between Dricus Du Plessis and Rafal Haratyk. Bonus coverage includes a middleweight melee that ends in submission between Mark Hulme and Gordon Roodman and a female strawweight fight that goes the distance between Danella Eliasov and Irene Rivera.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kagayaki, Kaisei, Ichinojo and Goeido from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Rafal Haratyk

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: Millionaire Thornton Melon's (Rodney Dangerfield) son is a college misfit, so Thornton lends some fatherly support...by enrolling as a fellow freshman! Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton's pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor's girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he'll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account - or go back to being the world's wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of days early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of days early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBCs The Exchange is the newsroom-based program for todays investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBCs "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is Americas post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is Americas post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 1
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBCs flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asias business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 2

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 1
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of Chinas economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 2
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of Chinas economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBCs Inside India gives you news and market commentary on the emerging powerhouse, businesses and people behind its rise. Inside India goes beyond the headlines to give you the edge and insights - this is your gateway to the India story.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBCs Inside India gives you news and market commentary on the emerging powerhouse, businesses and people behind its rise. Inside India goes beyond the headlines to give you the edge and insights - this is your gateway to the India story.

programme.title: Access Middle East - EP 1
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the worlds most dynamic regions.

programme.title: Access Middle East - EP 2
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the worlds most dynamic regions.

programme.title: U.S. Markets Edition - EP 137
programme.desc: U.S. Markets Edition delivers key takeaways from the most impactful interviews and insights from CNBCs programming in the US. As global markets become more interconnected, this program ensures audiences in Asia stay informed on major developments shaping the business world overnight.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 1
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the days session.

programme.desc: Its one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. programme.title: Worldwide Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBCs "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: The Exorcist's Meter - EP 16
programme.desc: A taxi driver unwittingly releases the curse of a 100-year-old spirit and begins to battle demons.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 & What's On Today - EP 14
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2692
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 8
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 26
programme.desc: Sau-yi accidentally hears Ka-pik speaking with someone on the phone. He is shocked to realize Chi-bun is Ko Sings son. Ko Sing abruptly dies due to some traffic accident. He called Sau-yi and also Ka-pik before his death. But the duo deny they have something to do with this matter. Ko Tsun gets drunk and then tells Ho-yee about Chi-buns true background.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 766
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 15
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 4
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2094
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 21
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] While covertly tailing Auyeung Kwan, Chow Chun-kit is full of doubts. However, when Chow Chun-kit finds out Auyeung Kwan often misses him at the cha chaan teng where he met Kwong, he believes he is not the mole. But Auyeung Kwan reminds Chow Chun-kit to be wary of Lui Hok-sums unusual maneuvers, and in particular, his suspicious behavior and the scheme behind.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 28
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven - EP 15
programme.desc: A girl disappears from the world due to the Bobble Incident, and seven wicked people are involved in the incident. Who will be able to survive this bloody revenge?

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 4
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 29
programme.desc: Kwun-fung tells Cheung Hei about some new experimental drug that could alleviate Tin-chos condition. Although there are risks involved, but she has faith in Kwun-fungs authoritative status. She decides to sign up for Tin-cho. Yau-sin comes up with all kinds of ideas and eventually manages to flee. Actually, there is some other reason behind the scheme.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 767
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Nine Yin True Sutra - EP 5
programme.desc: Nine Yin True Sutra - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Actually, Lau Yu-fans plan is for Chow Chun-kit and Ko Ho-yin to take turns to hold back Tai Cho-fuk so that they have time to prepare legal documents for his arrest and apply for a search warrant for Kin Fung Group. Lau Yu-fan goes to the prison to see Lee Nga-man as he hopes she has some way to make Tai Wing-keung come back to testify against Tai Cho-fuk.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 29
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2095
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 27
programme.desc: Sau-yi talks about certain issues before Hon-yeungs grave. Ko Tsun confirms Ko Sing saw Sau-yi before his death. Niki comes round. Sau-yan wants to step down as he hopes Ho-yee and Sau-yi team up to defend Yaus. Ho-yee objects to Sau-yi taking Yaus public. Chi-bun wants to realize cash flow quickly as he is going somewhere overseas for good.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 767
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 11
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a Fire master in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGs third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 20
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONGs father discovers MAN and KWONGs pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 16
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-mings wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 25
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 40
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 1
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 11
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a Fire master in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGs third son. programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 1
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a Fire master in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGs third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 2
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 18
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-mings wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 27
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 4
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 5
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well Too
programme.desc: Another super comedy directed by Clifton Ko about more farcical couplings, mistaken identities, infidelities, and arranged marriages set in the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Kill Time
programme.desc: Mak stumbles upon an obscure website "Witch's Zone" when looking for a copy of her dead father's favorite song. The mysterious website only allows one purchase but Mak cannot resist buying one more purple scarf. Not only does the scarf triggers her memories of her father and her first love, it may also be a vital clue in a mysterious murder.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: The story revolves around three lay disciples of the Shaolin Temple: Fang Shi Yu, Hong Xi Guan, and Hu Hui Qian. Monk Jie instructs them in martial arts, but their frequent competitions with fellow disciple Wu Qing spark rivalries. The once serene Shaolin Temple is plunged into chaos, yet even the abbot cannot help but be amused by their antics.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her...

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordsman Long meets Feng while searching for his missing father and they soon fall in love and marry. When Long is kidnapped by 'Dragon Gate Palace' one day, Feng embarks on a rescue mission and reunites with Long, who manages to escape. Together, they confront the head of 'Dragon Gate Palace', and uncover a long-hidden secret.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called "The Venoms", and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends' help.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this "young" auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong's hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!
